description: Simple extension for automatic AI chat continuation
command.start.title: 🚀 Start Auto Continue
command.stop.title: 🛑 Stop Auto Continue
command.toggle.title: 🔄 Toggle Auto Continue
command.openSettings.title: ⚙️ Open Settings
view.name: 🎮 Control Panel
view.container.title: Go Auto Continue
config.title: Go Auto Continue
config.interval.description: Interval between messages in seconds. Default is 10 seconds.
config.message.description: Phrase that will be sent to the chat. Default is 'continue'.
